channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Mattress, garden waste and machinery, 9th June
item.description:
Mattress is still there over a month after initial flytipping report. Large building tools/ machinery parts left on the floor by bins. Large open bag of garden waste left.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13-56, Tyers Gate, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: On the corner outside 2 malden road/132 powr, by the end of the blue painted bike lane, 9th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2B, Malden Road, Chalk Farm, London
